item.title: By: FB
item.dc:creator: FB
item.description: Good show boys... I literally LOLed the whole show. Good way to take in the news while on the train! One Recommendation I have is to super quickly blast through the headlines - like just read the headlines. Then go over them together after... great format which follows the 22-year precedent of the ass kicking "two decades of independent, unembedded news" from Democracy Now!
item.content:encoded: Good show boys… I literally LOLed the whole show. Good way to take in the news while on the train! One Recommendation I have is to super quickly blast through the headlines – like just read the headlines. Then go over them together after… great format which follows the 22-year precedent of the ass kicking “two decades of independent, unembedded news” from Democracy Now!

item.description: Thank you, Donna!
